00042 // Constructor.
00043 AffxFile::AffxFile()
00044 {
00045         m_iBufferSize = 1000000;
00046         m_cb = NULL;    
00047         m_icbLength = 0;
00048     m_iMarkedChar = UNMARKED;
00049     m_iReadAheadLimit = 0; 
00050     m_bSkipLF = false;
00051     m_bMarkedSkipLF = false;    
00052     m_iChars = 0;
00053         m_iNextChar = 0;
00054         m_pfileStream = NULL;
00055 }

00057 // Destructor.
00058 AffxFile::~AffxFile()
00059 {
00060         if (isOpen()) 
00061         {
00062                 m_pfileStream->close();
00063                 delete m_pfileStream;
00064         }
00065         if (m_cb != NULL) {delete[] m_cb;}
00066 }

00068 bool AffxFile::isHdf5(const AffxString& strFileName)
00069 {
00070         AffxFile file;
00071         if (!file.open(strFileName, AffxFile::LOAD)) {return false;}
00072         unsigned int ui = 0;
00073         char c1 = 0;
00074         char c2 = 0;
00075         char c3 = 0;
00076         file.read(&c1, 1, ui);
00077         file.read(&c1, 1, ui);
00078         file.read(&c2, 1, ui);
00079         file.read(&c3, 1, ui);
00080         file.close();
00081         return ((c1 == 'H') && (c2 == 'D') && (c3 == 'F'));
00082 }
00083 
00084 // Open the file.
00085 bool AffxFile::open(const AffxString& strFileName, m_enumOpenOptions enumOpenOption) 
00086 {
00087         m_pfileStream = new std::fstream;
00088         if (enumOpenOption == LOAD) {m_pfileStream->open(Util::convertPathName(strFileName).c_str(), fstream::in | fstream::binary);}
00089         else if (enumOpenOption == SAVE) {m_pfileStream->open(Util::convertPathName(strFileName).c_str(), fstream::out | fstream::binary | fstream::trunc);}
00090         else if (enumOpenOption == APPEND) {m_pfileStream->open(Util::convertPathName(strFileName).c_str(), fstream::out | fstream::binary | fstream::app);}
00091         if (!isOpen()) {delete m_pfileStream; m_pfileStream = NULL;}
00092         return isOpen();
00093 }

00095 // Get the file size in bytes.
00096 unsigned int AffxFile::getFileSize(const AffxString& strFileName)
00097 {
00098         unsigned int uiSize = 0;
00099 
00100         AffxFile file;
00101         if (file.open(strFileName, LOAD))
00102         { 
00103                 file.m_pfileStream->seekg (0, ios::end);
00104                 uiSize = (unsigned int)file.m_pfileStream->tellg();
00105                 file.close();
00106         }
00107 
00108         return uiSize;
00109 }

00111 // Read a the entire file into a byte array.
00112 bool AffxFile::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, AffxByteArray& ba)
00113 {
00114         AffxFile file;
00115         bool bSuccessful = false;
00116         unsigned int uiNumberBytes = getFileSize(strFileName);
00117 
00118         if (file.open(strFileName, LOAD))
00119         {
00120                 ba.setSize(uiNumberBytes);
00121                 if (uiNumberBytes > 0)
00122                 {
00123                         file.m_pfileStream->read(ba.getData(), uiNumberBytes);
00124                         bSuccessful = true;
00125                 }
00126                 file.close();
00127         }
00128         ba.setOffset(0);
00129 
00130         return bSuccessful;
00131 }

00154 {

00160         {
00161                 dwNumberBytes = ba.getSize();
00162 
00163                 if (dwNumberBytes > 0)
00164                 {
00165                         file.m_pfileStream->write(ba.getData(), dwNumberBytes);
00166                         bSuccessful = true;
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 file.close();
00170         }
00171 
00172         return bSuccessful;
00173 }

00211 AffxString AffxFile::parseDirectory(const AffxString& strFilePath)
00212 {
00213         AffxString strDirectory;
00214         AffxString strFileName;
00215         AffxString str = strFilePath;
00216         int iIndex = 0;
00217     bool absPath = false;
00218 
00219         while ((iIndex = findIndex(str)) != -1)
00220         {
00221         if(iIndex == 0)
00222             absPath = true;
00223                 strDirectory += ( strDirectory.empty() ? "" : PATH_SEPARATOR) + str.substring(0, (iIndex));
00224                 str = str.substring(iIndex + 1);
00225         }
00226         strFileName = str;
00227 
00228     if(absPath)
00229         strDirectory = PATH_SEPARATOR + strDirectory;
00230         return strDirectory;
00231 }

00233 int AffxFile::findIndex(AffxString& str)
00234 {
00235         int iIndex = (int)str.find("\\");
00236         if (iIndex == -1) {iIndex = (int)str.find("/");}
00237         return iIndex;
00238 }

00240 AffxString AffxFile::parseFileName(const AffxString& strFilePath)
00241 {
00242         AffxString strDirectory;
00243         AffxString strFileName;
00244         AffxString str = strFilePath;
00245         int iIndex = 0;
00246 
00247         while ((iIndex = findIndex(str)) != -1)
00248         {
00249                 strDirectory += str.substring(0, (iIndex + 1));
00250                 str = str.substring(iIndex + 1);
00251         }
00252         strFileName = str;
00253 
00254         return strFileName;
00255 }

00257 void AffxFile::read(char* p, unsigned int iLength, unsigned int& iBytesRead)
00258 {
00259         memset(p, 0, iLength);
00260         m_pfileStream->read(p, iLength);
00261         if (p[iLength - 1] != 0) {iBytesRead = iLength;}
00262         else {iBytesRead = (unsigned int)strlen(p);}
00263 }

00265 unsigned int AffxFile::getRowCount(const AffxString& strFileName)
00266 {
00267         unsigned int uiCount = 0;
00268         AffxFile file;
00269         AffxByteArray baLine;
00270         if (file.open(strFileName, AffxFile::LOAD))
00271         {
00272                 while (file.readLine(baLine))
00273                 {
00274                         uiCount++;
00275                 }
00276                 file.close();
00277         }
00278         return uiCount;
00279 }

00284 void AffxFile::fill() 
00285 {
00286         if (m_cb == NULL) 
00287         {
00288                 m_cb = new char[m_iBufferSize]; 
00289                 memset(m_cb, 0, m_iBufferSize); 
00290                 m_icbLength = m_iBufferSize;
00291         }
00292         int dst;
00293         if (m_iMarkedChar <= UNMARKED) {
00294                 /* No mark */
00295                 dst = 0;
00296         } else {
00297                 /* Marked */
00298                 int delta = m_iNextChar - m_iMarkedChar;
00299                 if (delta >= m_iReadAheadLimit) {
00300                 /* Gone past read-ahead limit: Invalidate mark */
00301                 m_iMarkedChar = INVALIDATED;
00302                 m_iReadAheadLimit = 0;
00303                 dst = 0;
00304                 } else {
00305                 if (m_iReadAheadLimit <= m_icbLength) {
00306                         /* Shuffle in the current buffer */
00307                         memcpy(m_cb, ((char *)m_cb + m_iMarkedChar), delta); 
00308                         m_iMarkedChar = 0;
00309                         dst = delta;
00310                 } else {
00311                         /* Reallocate buffer to accomodate read-ahead limit */
00312                         char* ncb = new char[m_iReadAheadLimit];
00313                         memset(ncb, 0, m_iReadAheadLimit);
00314                         memcpy(ncb, ((char *)m_cb + m_iMarkedChar), delta);
00315                         delete[] m_cb;
00316                         m_cb = ncb;
00317                         m_iMarkedChar = 0;
00318                         dst = delta;
00319                 }
00320                                 m_iNextChar = m_iChars = delta;
00321                 }
00322         }
00323 
00324         int n;
00325         unsigned int uiBytesRead = 0;
00326         read(m_cb + dst, m_icbLength - dst, uiBytesRead);
00327         if (uiBytesRead > 0)
00328         {
00329                 n = uiBytesRead;
00330         }
00331         else {n = -1;}
00332         if (n > 0) 
00333         {
00334                 m_iChars = dst + n;
00335                 m_iNextChar = dst;
00336         }
00337 }

00339 bool AffxFile::readLine(AffxByteArray& baLine)
00340 {       
00341         bool bEOF = false;
00342         baLine.setSize(0);
00343         baLine.setOffset(0);
00344 int startChar;
00345 bool ignoreLF = false;
00346 bool omitLF = ignoreLF || m_bSkipLF;
00347 
00348 //bufferLoop:
00349         for (;;) {
00350 
00351         if (m_iNextChar >= m_iChars)
00352                 fill();
00353         if (m_iNextChar >= m_iChars) { /* EOF */
00354                 return (baLine.length() > 0);
00355         }
00356         bool eol = false;
00357         char c = 0;
00358         int i;
00359 
00360             /* Skip a leftover '\n', if necessary */
00361         if (omitLF && (m_cb[m_iNextChar] == '\n'))
00362                 m_iNextChar++;
00363         m_bSkipLF = false;
00364         omitLF = false;
00365 
00366         // charLoop:
00367         for (i = m_iNextChar; i < m_iChars; i++) {
00368                 c = m_cb[i];
00369                 if ((c == '\n') || (c == '\r')) {
00370                 eol = true;
00371                 // break charLoop;
00372                 break;
00373                 }
00374         }
00375 
00376         startChar = m_iNextChar;
00377         m_iNextChar = i;
00378 
00379         if (eol) {
00380                 baLine.append(m_cb, startChar, i - startChar);
00381                 m_iNextChar++;
00382                 if (c == '\r') {
00383                 m_bSkipLF = true;
00384                 }
00385 //              return ((!(nextChar >= nChars)) || (baLine.length() > 0));
00386                 return true;
00387         }
00388         baLine.append(m_cb, startChar, i - startChar);
00389         }
00390 //              return (!bEOF);
00391         return ((!bEOF) || (baLine.length() > 0));
00392 }

00394 
00395 bool AffxFile::readLine()
00396 {       
00397         bool bEOF = false;
00398 int startChar;
00399 bool ignoreLF = false;
00400 bool omitLF = ignoreLF || m_bSkipLF;
00401 int iCount = 0;
00402 
00403 //bufferLoop:
00404         for (;;) {
00405 
00406         if (m_iNextChar >= m_iChars)
00407                 fill();
00408         if (m_iNextChar >= m_iChars) { /* EOF */
00409                 return (iCount > 0);
00410         }
00411         bool eol = false;
00412         char c = 0;
00413         int i;
00414 
00415             /* Skip a leftover '\n', if necessary */
00416         if (omitLF && (m_cb[m_iNextChar] == '\n'))
00417                 m_iNextChar++;
00418         m_bSkipLF = false;
00419         omitLF = false;
00420 
00421         // charLoop:
00422         for (i = m_iNextChar; i < m_iChars; i++) {
00423                 c = m_cb[i];
00424                 if ((c == '\n') || (c == '\r')) {
00425                 eol = true;
00426                 // break charLoop;
00427                 break;
00428                 }
00429         }
00430 
00431         startChar = m_iNextChar;
00432         m_iNextChar = i;
00433 
00434         if (eol) {
00435                 iCount += (i - startChar);
00436 //              baLine.append(cb, startChar, i - startChar);
00437                 m_iNextChar++;
00438                 if (c == '\r') {
00439                 m_bSkipLF = true;
00440                 }
00441 //              return ((!(nextChar >= nChars)) || (baLine.length() > 0));
00442                 return true;
00443         }
00444         iCount += (i - startChar);
00445 //      baLine.append(cb, startChar, i - startChar);
00446         }
00447 //              return (!bEOF);
00448         return ((!bEOF) || (iCount > 0));
00449 }

00451 void AffxFile::mkdir(const AffxString& str) 
00452 {
00453         AffxString strDirectory;
00454         AffxString strTemp = str;
00455         int iIndex = 0;
00456 
00457         while ((iIndex = findIndex(strTemp)) != -1)
00458         {
00459                 strDirectory += strTemp.substring(0, (iIndex + 1));
00460 #ifdef WIN32
00461                 _mkdir(strDirectory.c_str());
00462 #else
00463 		::mkdir(strDirectory.c_str(), S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG | S_IROTH | S_IXOTH);
00464 #endif
00465                 strTemp = strTemp.substring(iIndex + 1);
00466         }
00467 }
